Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: An Omics View of Asthma through Monozygotic Twins
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: An Omics View of Asthma through Monozygotic Twins
Configuration.Description: The etiology of asthma involves both genetic and non-genetic factors. We performed whole transcriptome sequencing on monozygotic twins discordant or concordant for asthma (with concordant healthy twins as controls), and identified multiple potential transcriptomic profiles associated with the asthma phenotype.
Configuration.StudyInEx: We included only monozygotic twins in our study, who were either discordant or concordant for asthma, or concordant healthy.

Journal.authors: Chen R, Jenks JA, Singh VV, Bauer RN, Lyu SC, Runyon S, Li-Pook-Than J, Mias GI, Nadeau KC, Snyder M
Journal.title: A Transcriptomic View of Asthma through Discordant and Concordant Monozygotic Twins
